eu.geclipse.core.model
Interface IGridInfoService

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, IGridElement, IGridResource, IGridService
public interface IGridInfoService
extends IGridService

An info service is an IGridService that provides access to a grid-related information database.

Method Summary
 IGridComputing[] fetchComputing(IGridContainer parent, IVirtualOrganization vo, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
          Fetch the computing elements from the underlying database that are available for the specified virtual organization.

Method Detail

fetchComputing

IGridComputing[] fetchComputing(IGridContainer parent,
                                IVirtualOrganization vo,
                                org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
Fetch the computing elements from the underlying database that are available for the specified virtual organization.

Parameters:
parent - The parent of this element.
vo - The virtual organization for which to fetch the computing elements. This may be null. In that case all available computing elements should be returned.
monitor - An IProgressMonitor to monitor the progress of the operation.
Returns:
The available computing elements for the specified VO or all available elements if the specified VO is null.

fetchStorage

IGridStorage[] fetchStorage(IGridContainer parent,
                            IVirtualOrganization vo,
                            org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
Fetch the storage elements from the underlying database that are available for the specified virtual organization.

Parameters:
parent - The parent of this element.
vo - The virtual organization for which to fetch the storage elements. This may be null. In that case all available storage elements should be returned.
monitor - An IProgressMonitor to monitor the progress of the operation.
Returns:
The available storage elements for the specified VO or all available elements if the specified VO is null.

fetchServices

IGridService[] fetchServices(IGridContainer parent,
                             IVirtualOrganization vo,
                             org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
Fetch all available services from the underlying database for the specified virtual organization.

Parameters:
parent - The parent of this element.
vo - The virtual organization for which to fetch the storage elements. This may be null. In that case all available services should be returned.
monitor - An IProgressMonitor to monitor the progress of the operation.
Returns:
The available services for the specified VO or all available services if the specified VO is null.
